title: The.Bridge.US.S01E04.REPACK.720p.HDTV.x264-EVOLVE
description:
The Bridge (US)

[*] Year: 2013
[*] Television: FX
[*] Genre: Drama, Crime
[*] Creators: Elwood Reid, Meredith Stayman
[*] Cast: Diane Kruger, Demian Bichir, Emily Rios, Eric Lange, Ted Levine


Growing on the border between El Paso and Juarez, "The Bridge" focuses on two detectives, one from U.S. and one from Mexico (played by Diane Kruger / Unknown, Inglourious Basterds / and Damien Bichir / Weeds, Savages /), which must to work together to catch a serial killer, and Going by the one and the other side of the US-Mexican border.
